overview: In Offside! blonde sex-god Philippe Delvaux, heads from his native Low Countries to the Czech Republic. His official mission is to play football with the lads from Prague. In reality, he has gone to enjoy as much cock and ass action as humanly possible! This is an objective the Belgian cock-slut enthusiastically grabs with both hands as the world of soccer is transformed into a spunk-sodden, nad-busting frenzy!
title: Offside!
